io.grant.core.retry

类 WaitStrategies

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.grant.core.retry.WaitStrategies

  • public final class WaitStrategies
extends Object
    Factory class for instances of WaitStrategy.
    作者:
    JB, lowzj

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static <T extends Throwable>
      WaitStrategy      		 exceptionWait(Class<T> exceptionClass, java.util.function.Function<T,Long> function)
      Returns a strategy which sleeps for an amount of time based on the Exception that occurred.
      static WaitStrategy exponentialWait()
      Returns a strategy which sleeps for an exponential amount of time after the first failed attempt, and in exponentially incrementing amounts after each failed attempt up to Long.MAX_VALUE.
      static WaitStrategy exponentialWait(long multiplier, long maximumTime, TimeUnit maximumTimeUnit)
      Returns a strategy which sleeps for an exponential amount of time after the first failed attempt, and in exponentially incrementing amounts after each failed attempt up to the maximumTime.
      static WaitStrategy exponentialWait(long maximumTime, TimeUnit maximumTimeUnit)
      Returns a strategy which sleeps for an exponential amount of time after the first failed attempt, and in exponentially incrementing amounts after each failed attempt up to the maximumTime.
      static WaitStrategy fibonacciWait()
      Returns a strategy which sleeps for an increasing amount of time after the first failed attempt, and in Fibonacci increments after each failed attempt up to Long.MAX_VALUE.
      static WaitStrategy fibonacciWait(long multiplier, long maximumTime, TimeUnit maximumTimeUnit)
      Returns a strategy which sleeps for an increasing amount of time after the first failed attempt, and in Fibonacci increments after each failed attempt up to the maximumTime.
      static WaitStrategy fibonacciWait(long maximumTime, TimeUnit maximumTimeUnit)
      Returns a strategy which sleeps for an increasing amount of time after the first failed attempt, and in Fibonacci increments after each failed attempt up to the maximumTime.
      static WaitStrategy fixedWait(long sleepTime, TimeUnit timeUnit)
      Returns a wait strategy that sleeps a fixed amount of time before retrying.
      static WaitStrategy incrementingWait(long initialSleepTime, TimeUnit initialSleepTimeUnit, long increment, TimeUnit incrementTimeUnit)
      Returns a strategy that sleeps a fixed amount of time after the first failed attempt and in incrementing amounts of time after each additional failed attempt.
      static WaitStrategy join(WaitStrategy... waitStrategies)
      Joins one or more wait strategies to derive a composite wait strategy.

      Returns a wait strategy that doesn't sleep at all before retrying.

      Returns a strategy that sleeps a random amount of time before retrying.

    • 方法详细资料

      • noWait

        public static WaitStrategy noWait()
        Returns a wait strategy that doesn't sleep at all before retrying. Use this at your own risk.
        返回:
        a wait strategy that doesn't wait between retries

      • fixedWait

        public static WaitStrategy fixedWait(long sleepTime,
                                     TimeUnit timeUnit)
                              throws IllegalStateException
        Returns a wait strategy that sleeps a fixed amount of time before retrying.
        参数:
        sleepTime - the time to sleep
        timeUnit - the unit of the time to sleep
        返回:
        a wait strategy that sleeps a fixed amount of time
        抛出:
        IllegalStateException - if the sleep time is < 0

      • randomWait

        public static WaitStrategy randomWait(long maximumTime,
                                      TimeUnit timeUnit)
        Returns a strategy that sleeps a random amount of time before retrying.
        参数:
        maximumTime - the maximum time to sleep
        timeUnit - the unit of the maximum time
        返回:
        a wait strategy with a random wait time
        抛出:
        IllegalStateException - if the maximum sleep time is <= 0.

      • randomWait

        public static WaitStrategy randomWait(long minimumTime,
                                      TimeUnit minimumTimeUnit,
                                      long maximumTime,
                                      TimeUnit maximumTimeUnit)
        Returns a strategy that sleeps a random amount of time before retrying.
        参数:
        minimumTime - the minimum time to sleep
        minimumTimeUnit - the unit of the minimum time
        maximumTime - the maximum time to sleep
        maximumTimeUnit - the unit of the maximum time
        返回:
        a wait strategy with a random wait time
        抛出:
        IllegalStateException - if the minimum sleep time is < 0, or if the maximum sleep time is less than (or equals to) the minimum.

      • incrementingWait

        public static WaitStrategy incrementingWait(long initialSleepTime,
                                            TimeUnit initialSleepTimeUnit,
                                            long increment,
                                            TimeUnit incrementTimeUnit)
        Returns a strategy that sleeps a fixed amount of time after the first failed attempt and in incrementing amounts of time after each additional failed attempt.
        参数:
        initialSleepTime - the time to sleep before retrying the first time
        initialSleepTimeUnit - the unit of the initial sleep time
        increment - the increment added to the previous sleep time after each failed attempt
        incrementTimeUnit - the unit of the increment
        返回:
        a wait strategy that incrementally sleeps an additional fixed time after each failed attempt

      • exponentialWait

        public static WaitStrategy exponentialWait()
        Returns a strategy which sleeps for an exponential amount of time after the first failed attempt, and in exponentially incrementing amounts after each failed attempt up to Long.MAX_VALUE.
        返回:
        a wait strategy that increments with each failed attempt using exponential backoff

      • exponentialWait

        public static WaitStrategy exponentialWait(long maximumTime,
                                           TimeUnit maximumTimeUnit)
        Returns a strategy which sleeps for an exponential amount of time after the first failed attempt, and in exponentially incrementing amounts after each failed attempt up to the maximumTime.
        参数:
        maximumTime - the maximum time to sleep
        maximumTimeUnit - the unit of the maximum time
        返回:
        a wait strategy that increments with each failed attempt using exponential backoff

      • exponentialWait

        public static WaitStrategy exponentialWait(long multiplier,
                                           long maximumTime,
                                           TimeUnit maximumTimeUnit)
        Returns a strategy which sleeps for an exponential amount of time after the first failed attempt, and in exponentially incrementing amounts after each failed attempt up to the maximumTime. The wait time between the retries can be controlled by the multiplier. nextWaitTime = exponentialIncrement * multiplier.
        参数:
        multiplier - multiply the wait time calculated by this
        maximumTime - the maximum time to sleep
        maximumTimeUnit - the unit of the maximum time
        返回:
        a wait strategy that increments with each failed attempt using exponential backoff

      • fibonacciWait

        public static WaitStrategy fibonacciWait()
        Returns a strategy which sleeps for an increasing amount of time after the first failed attempt, and in Fibonacci increments after each failed attempt up to Long.MAX_VALUE.
        返回:
        a wait strategy that increments with each failed attempt using a Fibonacci sequence

      • fibonacciWait

        public static WaitStrategy fibonacciWait(long maximumTime,
                                         TimeUnit maximumTimeUnit)
        Returns a strategy which sleeps for an increasing amount of time after the first failed attempt, and in Fibonacci increments after each failed attempt up to the maximumTime.
        参数:
        maximumTime - the maximum time to sleep
        maximumTimeUnit - the unit of the maximum time
        返回:
        a wait strategy that increments with each failed attempt using a Fibonacci sequence

      • fibonacciWait

        public static WaitStrategy fibonacciWait(long multiplier,
                                         long maximumTime,
                                         TimeUnit maximumTimeUnit)
        Returns a strategy which sleeps for an increasing amount of time after the first failed attempt, and in Fibonacci increments after each failed attempt up to the maximumTime. The wait time between the retries can be controlled by the multiplier. nextWaitTime = fibonacciIncrement * multiplier.
        参数:
        multiplier - multiply the wait time calculated by this
        maximumTime - the maximum time to sleep
        maximumTimeUnit - the unit of the maximum time
        返回:
        a wait strategy that increments with each failed attempt using a Fibonacci sequence

      • exceptionWait

        public static <T extends Throwable> WaitStrategy exceptionWait(Class<T> exceptionClass,
                                                               java.util.function.Function<T,Long> function)
        Returns a strategy which sleeps for an amount of time based on the Exception that occurred. The function determines how the sleep time should be calculated for the given exceptionClass. If the exception does not match, a wait time of 0 is returned.
        类型参数:
        T - exception class
        参数:
        function - function to calculate sleep time
        exceptionClass - class to calculate sleep time from
        返回:
        a wait strategy calculated from the failed attempt

      • join

        public static WaitStrategy join(WaitStrategy... waitStrategies)
        Joins one or more wait strategies to derive a composite wait strategy. The new joined strategy will have a wait time which is total of all wait times computed one after another in order.
        参数:
        waitStrategies - Wait strategies that need to be applied one after another for computing the sleep time.
        返回:
        A composite wait strategy
